text: We just seem to keep finding tasty new ways to enjoy buffalo chicken. It?s the gift that keeps on giving. Today we?ll show you how to make Buffalo Chicken Stuffed Onion Rings. What You?ll Need: Onions Shredded chicken Cream cheese Cheddar cheese Buffalo sauce Flour Beaten eggs Panko crumbs Steps: Cut onions into rings Mix chicken, cream cheese, cheddar cheese and buffalo sauce in a bowl Place one large onion ring around a smaller ring Fill the space between with buffalo chicken mixture Freeze 2 hours Dip frozen rings in flour, egg dip and panko crumbs Deep fry at 350 degrees until golden
